name: openbabel
description:
Open Babel is a chemical toolbox designed to speak the many languages of
chemical data. It's an open, collaborative project allowing anyone to
search, convert, analyze, or store data from molecular modeling,
chemistry, solid-state materials, biochemistry, or related areas.

dependencies.name: cmake
dependencies.description:
A cross-platform, open-source build system. CMake is a family of tools
designed to build, test and package software.

dependencies.name: pkgconfig
dependencies.description:
pkg-config is a helper tool used when compiling applications and
libraries

dependencies.name: swig
dependencies.description:
SWIG is an interface compiler that connects programs written in C and
C++ with scripting languages such as Perl, Python, Ruby, and Tcl. It
works by taking the declarations found in C/C++ header files and using
them to generate the wrapper code that scripting languages need to
access the underlying C/C++ code. In addition, SWIG provides a variety
of customization features that let you tailor the wrapping process to
suit your application.

dependencies.name: boost
dependencies.description:
Boost provides free peer-reviewed portable C++ source libraries,
emphasizing libraries that work well with the C++ Standard Library.
Boost libraries are intended to be widely useful, and usable across a
broad spectrum of applications. The Boost license encourages both
commercial and non-commercial use.

dependencies.name: cairo
dependencies.description: Cairo is a 2D graphics library with support for multiple output devices.

dependencies.name: pango
dependencies.description:
Pango is a library for laying out and rendering of text, with an
emphasis on internationalization. It can be used anywhere that text
layout is needed, though most of the work on Pango so far has been done
in the context of the GTK+ widget toolkit.

dependencies.name: eigen
dependencies.description:
Eigen is a C++ template library for linear algebra matrices, vectors,
numerical solvers, and related algorithms.

dependencies.name: libxml2
dependencies.description:
Libxml2 is the XML C parser and toolkit developed for the Gnome project
(but usable outside of the Gnome platform), it is free software
available under the MIT License.

dependencies.name: zlib
dependencies.description:
A free, general-purpose, legally unencumbered lossless data-compression
library.

dependencies.name: rapidjson
dependencies.description: A fast JSON parser/generator for C++ with both SAX/DOM style API

dependencies.name: uuid
dependencies.description:
OSSP uuid is a ISO-C:1999 application programming interface (API) and
corresponding command line interface (CLI) for the generation of DCE
1.1, ISO/IEC 11578:1996 and RFC 4122 compliant Universally Unique
Identifier (UUID).

dependent_to.name: bigdft-core
dependent_to.description:
BigDFT-core: the core components of BigDFT, an electronic structure
calculation based on Daubechies wavelets.

dependent_to.name: bigdft-atlab
dependent_to.description: BigDFT-atlab: library for ATomic related operations.
